resources.string: Kia ora! Im Kauri the Kākāpō!\nHow are you?
Dont know? You can talk to me\nand I can help

Kauri the Kākāpō is more than just a mascot, he’s your friendly helper and protector.

 Kauri grew up in a big, safe forest where all the birds looked after each other. One day, he heard about kids
 who were feeling scared or alone, and he knew he had to help.

 Now, Kauri flies into your phones to be by your side. He listens when you want to talk, shows you how to stay safe, and reminds you that you’re never alone.

 Kauri might be small, but his heart is strong and brave, just like you. If you ever need someone to talk to or help you find a safe path, Kauri is here for you.
